welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hermosillo, Mexico! Get ready to experience the vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and warm hospitality this city is known for. We hope you have a fantastic time exploring all that Hermosillo has to offer."

restaurants.address: Jose Maria Morelos 16 (Juan Bautista de Anza), 83150 Hermosillo, Sonora
